title: Intra-abdominal rhabdomyosarcoma in a paediatric patient presenting as acute appendicitis
details: MC Moolamannil, H Khan, S Karim - The Annals of The Royal College of Surgeons of …, 2024
abstract: Rhabdomyosarcoma (RMS) is a form of soft tissue sarcoma that can arise from muscle or fibrous tissue almost anywhere in the body. The two major subtypes of RMS are alveolar and embryonal, whereas the two rarer subtypes are pleomorphic …
